job_title: IT Desktop Build Engineer in London, England
pros:
Wonderful IT Staff, and a Brilliant Manager, the team I was working with were fun friendly and helpful.

Everyone knew what their strengths and weaknesses were, and complimented each other.
The overal IT Department manager  was brilliant, knew his job and understood, and complimented and rewarded everyone appropriately. 

Always plenty of treats through the week, to chow down on.

1st Line team was brilliant, and the manager treated everyone like an equal and if you had a problem he could be spoken too honestly and openly, and told you things straight and true to the point. - excellent to work with and didn't beat around the bush.
cons:
Within certain teams there are certain clicks, but despite this it wasn't as bad as it can be in most office based enviroments where politics can get in the way of work.

One team manager, in the IT Department needed to work on his managerial skills a little more rather than trying to be a friend to everyone and belittling and encouraging the bullying that was happening to certain individuals on that team.

The pranks and humor that happened in this team were distracting for newer people coming in, and the backstabbing and talking about previous employees that held the position was bordering on anti social, and offensive, in the sencond line team.

pros: Great work experience, will gain lots of skills as you are able to rotate
cons: short staffed and lots of work load
